tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Consulted doctor Neelwanti in March as was going through breathlessness and pins and needle issue …doctor is very experienced  and patiently listened to my issues …. She takes the time to understand the issue and is very patient. Very happy with all the visits so far.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
It’s rare to find a doctor who pays a patient ear to the story and also goes beyond her way to check on other aspects of lifestyle to recommend solutions. We we isolated at home due to Covid and her tele consultation session had a huge boost in our confidence. 

Thank you very much for all that you did for us. Gratitude.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I came for the treatment of chicken pox. Right from the beginning of diagnosis till treatment and medication, I am satisfied with everything. Doctor Nilawanti Soni's consultation *** ********* was very good and I am overall very much satisfied with the service provided by her and Apollo clinic, kondapur. I will visit again in case I face any health hazard in future.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I had a very disappointing experience with Dr. Neelwanti. She seemed to be in a constant hurry and didn't take the time to listen to my concerns. When a patient comes to a doctor with a serious illness, it should be treated with the utmost care and attention. Her casual approach is unacceptable *** *********. * ******* *** ****** ** ******** ** *** *********** ** ******* ********* **** ** ***** *********

tags: None
review: Very unfriendly doctor. *** *********** I have complained of swelling, and pain. She did not even test and check where the pain is or how much it is. Simply said Vitamin deficiency even though my D and calcium are looking good as per reports, she gave so many supplements.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Wastte of time and money. Writes test for every symptoms you say. Don't even check your pulse of heartbeat. Don't even get up from seat to check even for physical pain. Please don't visit

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Doctor was not being formal. She was not ready to listen to my complete issue. Many tests were written which were not actually required . Later we came to know this. *********** ****** *** ** ***** ** ****** This is the reason we will be in fear to consult a doctor.

tags: None
review:
My wife has fever with breathing problem..this doctor just give some antibiotic and fever medicine. we did blood test... but so many times we said that she has breathing problem..she did not ask for any chest x-ray after 7 days still she had breathing problem and fever..I changed my doctor and check the  chest xray..she had fluid in her lungs. she did not check her blood pressure not use any stethoscope ..plz plz plz don't visit her. 

now she is under medication. please suggest what action I can take against this doctor.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
My wife is dentist and I am a pharmacist, we kept our knowledge aside to seek genuine doctor advice. ** ******** *** ********** ** ****** ******* **** ** ** ** **** ************ *********** *********** ***** ** ********* ****** *** *** We didn't find any benefit , no clinical history was asked, what ever we voluntarily told, he had prescribed medicines for that symptoms alone.
We visited with complaint of weakness and vomiting sensation for my wife and she prescribed, lipid profile, CBC, Hba1c, urine culture *** ***** ******** **** **** *** ********* ** *** ****
Even after telling that we have a kid who is on nursing, *** *** ********** *************** ***** *** *** **** ****** ** ** **** *** ******* ********** ***** ******* ********** ** **** **** ***** **** *** ******** *** **** ******* *****Felt it was just injustice to value
 of money and time.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I was bit reluctant to visit this doctor after reading others feedback but had no option, but those experiences shared by other users became true. As shared by others, she is on marathon, in just 20 mins she finished looking at 6 patients ahead of me. This is my follow-up visit. We went to the doctor as my wife experienced symptoms like uneasiness, severe headache, neck pain. When I shared info that her BP was high when tested at home, she simply rejected those symptoms and suggested for a complete health checkup mentioning that she might be having lot of problems. We went back today with all the test results and she looked at them hardly for 2mins and then started writing a prescription for every symptom she had without even enquiring about the problem, every time my wife told about a symptom she wrote a new medicine and by end 5 mins she wrote 7 medicines. * **** **** ** *** * ******* **** ******** ** ****** Finishing touch is the best one, when my wife said I'm having dry cough she immediately wrote an antibiotic for 5 days dose, one cetirizine and one syrup, I was shocked. I literally asked do we really need antibiotic her answer was Yes, couldn't understand what else she said as it was in 2x speed. She was literally pushing us out to see next patient and that was a horrible experience for us and felt we made a big mistake visiting this doctor. I suggest to avoid this doctor at any cost, *** ** *** ***** *** **** *** ******

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Neelwati just recommended 7 different types of medicines and COVID test, blood tests, urine test, vitamin tests *** ****** **** **** when we had just 2 months old reports for all the above tests. She did not explain why is she recommending those tests as well.
reply_text: Sir u have already decided it’s common cold , then u sd not visit  to any doctor because u were sure .in this COVID situation I need to tell abt COVID test also .. vit test suggested because of  back pain or some other muscular pain.. without understanding the situation , it’s diff to judge someone .. it must be told for yr good health .cbp we need for  yr current state of health

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: went to this doctor looking at the qualifier but she was not professional , doctor was in hurry , *** *** ** ****** *********** ,started writing medication and blood test *** ***** ***** ****** **** ******* * **** ** **  ******** she was in so much of hurry that she did not even explain the prescription. had to figure it out on our own.doctor won't ask any history just prescribe you medicines for your current issue ******* ******* *** **************
reply_text: Sometimes symptoms are self explanatory..so with experience we can write medication first with symptomatic according our clinical  acumen..this approach is followed by all good doctors ..and in pandemic , I need to go for certain test sometimes which are required ..not right way for judging like this..withthese many pts recovered ..

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review: I was suffering from dry cough and throat pain for almost a week and finally decided to meet a doctor. I trusted good reviews about Dr.Neelwanti Soni and got her appointment. She was a bit reserved and did not really give much insights into the issue I had and why it persisted so long, But the medication she gave worked like a charm and I started getting better in a day.  While I would definitely appreciate the doctor be more conversations with patients and explaining the issue they had in detail, I still would recommend the doctor definitely.

review: It was a good experience consulting with Dr. Neelwanti Soni. I was suffering with Cold and cough for 3 days. after consulting her, went through a few tests, which helped be get better and identifying other issues such high BP and cholesterol (which I wasn't aware of). She has a great experience and I am thankful to her, now I can manage my health in a better way. Highly recommended.
